title: Utilizing mechatronic agilent gas chromatography to validate therapeutic efficacy of Combretum paniculatum against oxidative stress and inflammation
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Ifeoma F. Chukwuma, Kennedy Chinedu Okafor, Victor O. Apeh, Florence N. Nworah, Chigozie Paul Odo, Ijeoma Peace Okafor, Kelvin Anoh, Okoronkwo Chukwunenye Anthony
